name: Markdown
description:
Create a component using markdown. Most markdown features available and more to come.


Available Features:

  • Code block
  • List items and sub items
  • Block quotes
  • Headers
  • Line seperator
  • Bold and italics
  • Inline code


Future Features

  • Images
  • Links


Component Props

  • Light and dark theme
  • 4 detail colors
  • Font size
  • Auto line wrapping


If you would like a feature that is not currently available comment your request. Thanks!!!
